issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This issue was found during verification of EUCA-1980.

For EUCA-1980 failover was triggered by using "killall -9 postgres" to simulate a failure. The issue appears to be a delay in the shutdown of Jetty (administration UI), possibly when there are active requests.

Log showing delay on shutdown after DB failure:
{code}
Tue Jun 12 16:24:32 2012  WARN Threads                 | SHUTDOWN:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_73/ Stopping thread pool...
Tue Jun 12 16:32:29 2012  INFO SystemBootstrapper      | Creating Bootstrapper instance.
{code}

Stack traces captured during delayed shutdown:
{code}
"Shutdown" prio=10 tid=0x00007ff628ede000 nid=0x3679 waiting on condition [0x00007ff609009000]
   java.lang.Thread.State: TIMED_WAITING (sleeping)
        at java.lang.Thread.sleep(Native Method)
        at org.mortbay.thread.QueuedThreadPool.doStop(QueuedThreadPool.java:435)
        at org.mortbay.component.AbstractLifeCycle.stop(AbstractLifeCycle.java:78)
        - locked <0x00000000b97818e0> (a java.lang.Object)
        at org.mortbay.jetty.AbstractConnector.doStop(AbstractConnector.java:318)
        at org.mortbay.jetty.nio.SelectChannelConnector.doStop(SelectChannelConnector.java:326)
        at org.mortbay.component.AbstractLifeCycle.stop(AbstractLifeCycle.java:78)
        - locked <0x00000000b9781748> (a java.lang.Object)
        at org.mortbay.jetty.Server.doStop(Server.java:280)
        at org.mortbay.component.AbstractLifeCycle.stop(AbstractLifeCycle.java:78)
        - locked <0x00000000b9781808> (a java.lang.Object)
        at org.mortbay.jetty.Server$ShutdownHookThread.run(Server.java:561)

"Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:Topology::external/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#36" prio=10 tid=0x0000000001403000 nid=0x4371 in Object.wait() [0x00007ff622ea5000]
   java.lang.Thread.State: WAITING (on object monitor)
        at java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)
        - waiting on <0x00000000b96eb080> (a org.mortbay.jetty.Server$ShutdownHookThread)
        at java.lang.Thread.join(Thread.java:1203)
        - locked <0x00000000b96eb080> (a org.mortbay.jetty.Server$ShutdownHookThread)
        at java.lang.Thread.join(Thread.java:1256)
        at java.lang.ApplicationShutdownHooks.run(ApplicationShutdownHooks.java:97)
        at java.lang.Shutdown.runHooks(Shutdown.java:106)
        at java.lang.Shutdown.sequence(Shutdown.java:150)
        at java.lang.Shutdown.exit(Shutdown.java:195)
        - locked <0x00000000f01c1aa0> (a java.lang.Class for java.lang.Shutdown)
        at java.lang.Runtime.exit(Runtime.java:107)
        at java.lang.System.exit(System.java:923)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.EucalyptusBuilder$Check$1.apply(EucalyptusBuilder.java:104)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.EucalyptusBuilder.fireCheck(EucalyptusBuilder.java:91)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$ServiceLocalTransitionCallbacks$3.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:622)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.processTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:356)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.access$000(ServiceTransitions.java:119)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$TransitionActions.leave(ServiceTransitions.java:408)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$TransitionActions.leave(ServiceTransitions.java:375)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.leave(TransitionImpl.java:156)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState$ActiveTransition.leave(AtomicMarkedState.java:462)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.afterLeave(AtomicMarkedState.java:280)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.transition(AtomicMarkedState.java:123)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:137)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:84)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:142)
        at com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:127)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.executeTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:312)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.pathTo(ServiceTransitions.java:178)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.doTopologyChange(Topology.java:1156)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.apply(Topology.java:1147)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions.apply(Topology.java:1119)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions$4.apply(Topology.java:1097)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$Transitions$4.apply(Topology.java:1088)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$6.call(Topology.java:997)
        at com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$6.call(Topology.java:985)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
        at com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:681)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
{code}
fields.summary: HA: CLC shutdown delayed when failing over

comments.body: Reducing the priority to "minor", due to the fact the HA system does return to a normal operational state with out system admin intervention.
I have not tested this issue in any release since 3.1.0, it is possible it is addressed by update of Jetty dependencies in 3.3.x (or by changes in other releases)
